name: Recovery
description:
M.M.I, pt 1: Relapse

"Dips and blips and relapse"

Recovery is long-drawn-out process to a better state. A tedious work, as some would say. The path maybe rough and covered in mist, but that path will surely take you to the best place you could have ever been.

Museum of Mental Incapabilities is a collection of artworks depicting mental health problems and disorders. Explore and understand what it feels like to live with various mental incapacities.
